item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
On finishing reading Mullins Book Roger Lewis 11:01 PM (0 minutes ago) to mike
The second half of the book Mike is a white supremacist fascist rant and laden with paranoic confirmation biases. Half a dozen of one and six of the other, although the question is not binary An interesting but ultimately disappointing read Mullings lets himself and his own scholarship down, Pound is rather less vulgar I think.
item.content:encoded:
On finishing reading Mullins Book
Roger Lewis
11:01 PM (0 minutes ago)
to mike

The second half of the book Mike is a white supremacist fascist rant and laden with paranoic confirmation biases. Half a dozen of one and six of the other, although the question is not binary
An interesting but ultimately disappointing read Mullings lets himself and his own scholarship down, Pound is rather less vulgar I think.
